FAIR semantics
Preliminary Recommendations
14
P-Rec. 9: Semantic artefacts should be represented
using common serialization formats, e.g., Semantic
Web and Linked Data standards
§ Related FAIR principle: I1
§ Existing recommendations: RDF, OWL, SKOS, etc.
§ Stakeholders: Practitioner and Repository
